snippet.title: Mon Deewana Mon Video Song | Amar Prem Bengali Movie 2016

localized.description:
Watch exclusive “Amar Prem” videos & Original videos on Eros Now https://www.erosnow.com

Watch the peppy youth number ‘Mon Deewana Mon’ featuring Gaurab Roy Chowdhary & Megha Chowdhary from the Bengali movie ‘Amar Prem’.

Set 'Mon Deewana Mon' as your caller tune http://111.93.115.200/TZ/WEB/CallerTune.aspx?refID=EIAP1 OR SMS 'EIAP1' to 56060

Singers: Shaan & Ishani Nag
Music: Dev Sen
Lyrics: Saheb Saha
Dance Director: Baba Yadav 
Arranged By: Dev Sen
Guitar By: Raja Choudhury
Keyboard By: Bob Sn
Flute By: Bubai
Chorus Singers: Vicky, Saheb, Pritam & Dev Sen

Movie: Amar Prem
Cast: Gaurab Roy Chowdhary, Antasheela Ghosh, Megha Chowdhary & Saurav Chakraborti 
Produced By: M. M. Moviez
Directed By: Haranath Chakraborty 
Story, Screenplay & Dialogue : Urmila Majhi, Anshuman Praytush & Promit
D.O.P: Supriyo Dutta
Edit: Anindya Chattopadhyay

'Amar Prem' releases in theatres on 9th December, 2016

To watch more log on to http://www.erosnow.com
